description: This file defines React functional components for UI toggles: TabToggle for toggling between 'Preview' and 'Code', and CodeTabs for switching between HTML and JavaScript code snippets. It includes accessibility features such as ARIA roles and focus-visible styles.

methods.name: TabToggle({ value, onChange, idBase = 'preview-code' })
methods.description: A React component that renders toggle buttons for switching between 'Preview' and 'Code', managing focus and ARIA attributes for accessibility.

methods.name: CodeTabs({ html, js, renderBlock, idBase = 'code-tabs' })
methods.description: A React component providing tabbed interface to switch between HTML and JS code snippets, with accessible roles and dynamic content.

ctags.name: CodeTabs
ctags.pattern: /^export function CodeTabs({ html, js, renderBlock, idBase = 'code-tabs' }) {$/
